title: Yohane the Parhelion: The Story of the Sound of Heart
description:
:This article is about the live concert. For other uses, see Yohane the Parhelion (disambiguation).
 is a live concert event that took place at Musashino Forest Sport Plaza in Chofu, Tokyo on December 15, 16 & 17, 2023.
